name: Spooker
description:
Go around the graveyard and spook the kids for their candy! Get the allotted amount of candy to win before running out of time! If the kids see you, you will lose time.

Controls:

WASD, Left click to scare kids, Shift to sneak around, ESC for a pause / help menu.

The closer you get, the more candy you will get.

This is a project made for a game jam hosted by Marist and IGDA from 10/23 to 10/25.

Credits:

Programming:

Erick Latshaw and Paul Harden

Modeling (rocks, gravestones, trees, candy, ghost):

Paul Harden
